SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="806af868a34d4e3d8aa8aef9615fa4e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Ever since you started,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] your hard work
has really saved us.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're the rising
star of the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's for sure.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="806af868a34d4e3d8aa8aef9615fa4e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]When it comes to exploring uncharted
planets,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] danger is just part of the job.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Still, I have no doubt you'll manage.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="806af868a34d4e3d8aa8aef9615fa4e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]How can I be so certain?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Because I have
two eyes and I can see your potential plain
as day.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I hired you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] didn't I?
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_00_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9f3e55072c16464ea2b8f3b4266e0642" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]As far as taking your skills to the next
level goes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] do not worry.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm putting
together a thorough training regimen.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Menu_Unlocked:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="aba59947e2e640c4bc55c679995731c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]As soon as you two are ready,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's get
your training started.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_IntroAndMenu_Unlocked:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e26a8d317ccb4ec188dcbd8b9f7d0233" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there you are.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e26a8d317ccb4ec188dcbd8b9f7d0233" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Danger is a constant when exploring an
unknown planet like this one.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]skills[System:Color name="Default"] I'll
teach you and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] just might save you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e26a8d317ccb4ec188dcbd8b9f7d0233" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]As long as you and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] keep building up
his Pup Drive,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's nothing the two of
you can't do.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e26a8d317ccb4ec188dcbd8b9f7d0233" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Well, I hope you're ready,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] because it's time
to start your [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]training[System:Color name="Default"]!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="eb5e5f7f801d4a419b2d9d6cf74f6444" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Alright, it's time to commence [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]training[Grammar:Decap/][System:Color name="Default"]![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The journey will be long and arduous,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but
I have no doubt you two can handle it.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="da62d7c2410144f582af9defba85e142" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]When you've completed your training and
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]mastered all of the skills[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm certain you'll
see things in a whole new light!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7fdd1956814d4ef6882860a1f0f12f47" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]To ensure the success of a rescue
mission,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there are three things you must
do: training,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] training...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]and more training.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="4513486fab424524b30161b24b95a353" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Improve your abilities just a little each day.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
In time, it'll add up,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and you'll be stunned
by what the two of you are capable of.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d6e19a5f0f804a258d85ce4bae9bd931" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Make sure you tackle a variety of training
types, OK?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That way you and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] are
sure to steadily improve.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="64e86154118e4e00aabc1b22ffc0da96" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]that look on your face.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Yes.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can
see it in your eyes.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You and
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]are ready[System:Color name="Default"].
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3c74b314d3f44bcf826c032f6552c821" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Ultimate Secret[System:Color name="Default"]'s been passed down in
my family for generations.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Master it, and
you'll be initiated into the [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal02"/]Shepherd[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] Way!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d37e96e61c3746b1a3e2469d44ddfe84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The culmination of all your training...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]it's a
part of your DNA now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So get out there![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Carry out your mission with confidence!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3a148b11bf4949ea8fbcd129bd0d7061" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Just be sure you stay focused on the
mission to the very end.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll be watching,
and I promise...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]nothing slips by me!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Intro_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="55e1aa83d1ec43118041b0e912badb32" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] looks like it's time to head home with
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] everyone you rescued...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
they're all grateful for what you did.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="ad66d133210f4bb78527f88de8569fab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I've been around many an outstanding
Rescue Pup in my time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I feel
like there isn't anything he can't do.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1d3e0cb25fea48c380c61ed87def7c01" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Execute your missions with care and
precision.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's how you get your name
carved into Rescue Corps history!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0f4341b646ba4ac9940bb0fcb767c678" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s work is flawless...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]which is why I end
up asking him to take on extra tasks that
aren't a part of his job description.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7e1b5687d2964f75b32104960eb75326" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]This is your first job as a Rescue Officer.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
So, how are you holding up?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If you need
advice,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm here.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Drop by anytime.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1fbc84c35740417ebddf53b73717c5ef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I hate to admit it, but...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]the only creatures
I'm any good with are dogs.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="98984ce703eb45e79e462716dc986ecd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I hear that ever since [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was little,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
he's spent all of his free time tinkering
with machines.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="98984ce703eb45e79e462716dc986ecd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]When he joined the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he was
already a highly skilled comms operator.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="17c495f368264f9e95237902d081ddd2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I consider myself real lucky to have
a scientific genius like [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] around.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
There's just...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]one problem.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="17c495f368264f9e95237902d081ddd2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]I have no idea what he's talking about
half the time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I find it best to just nod
approvingly.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Seems to make him feel good.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7e113c7488b443879d3bb8510cca8fd2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If I didn't have my duties as captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
there's nothing I'd like to do more than
head out and explore with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="51e147e4030e416597196c36baa8c8f9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]There's nothing like the feeling of rescuing
someone who's met with disaster.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All of my
ancestors chased after that feeling.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="51e147e4030e416597196c36baa8c8f9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I'm still new to being a captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I hope
what I do here on this planet brings me
closer to them.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="b5b649e6538c40c385cdd05244c107cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s ability to assess situations comes
so naturally to him.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He may be young,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but
his skills merit our full confidence.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0eb7d2bfde9546d687de0442c77a38a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadTalk"/]You've only been here a short time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
yet you've already found yourself taking
on some challenging work.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0eb7d2bfde9546d687de0442c77a38a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/]Trust me.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] These early pains will lead to
later gains.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1ba7e8bbadf1471b81bc4f00f86abb9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Running a rescue operation on an unknown
planet...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have to say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I made a pretty
drastic decision to do this.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1ba7e8bbadf1471b81bc4f00f86abb9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]My family has run the Rescue Corps for
generations,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but no one has taken on a
mission as difficult as this one.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e285c674665d47e1a6f2f67b24c64399" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]When [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] joined the Rescue Corps, things
got pretty hectic.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] His entire extended
family came to see him off.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It was chaos![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e285c674665d47e1a6f2f67b24c64399" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]They threw a huge party for him.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] And I
don't know how it happened,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I got
stuck taking coats at the door!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c5ec59b6d7844bb8be5295353a054b59" Scale="0.9967672"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Before [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] joined up, he tried his hand at
all sorts of part-time jobs.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] He wanted to
cover his school expenses himself,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you see.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c5ec59b6d7844bb8be5295353a054b59" Scale="0.9967672"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/]Now, thanks to all that experience,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he's
not only a talented comms operator but
handy with all sorts of other tasks too.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7afe35098e2141e592c9d3fb306a7c8d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I've been around many an outstanding
Rescue Pup in my time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but Oatchi...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I feel
like there isn't anything he can't do.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1d6359dac3654adb9c1d989a45b6e207" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Execute your missions with care and
precision.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's how you get your name
carved into Rescue Corps history!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c864c56327b94c9386d395637aec9819" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] seems rough around the edges,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but
at his core,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he's meticulous and cautious...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Important traits when you're a ranger.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c864c56327b94c9386d395637aec9819" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]If he gets even a tiny scratch,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he refuses
to move a muscle until it's healed.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's
how detail oriented he is.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Talk about a pro.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a9f6d8190a1e42f58389ef0587e00e7b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]I should warn you in advance:[etc:Wait frame="8"/] be wary of
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s health supplements. [System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a9f6d8190a1e42f58389ef0587e00e7b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Once, during an extremely tough mission,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
he gave me a "vitamin booster," and my
toes swelled up three times their size!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="96615d1aa3204664b9e002a4bcd1c05e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]This may surprise you, but [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is real
close to his family.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] No doubt he's off
sorting the souvenirs he got for his mom.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="96615d1aa3204664b9e002a4bcd1c05e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Every time he comes home, they throw a
big "Souvenir Gifting Ceremony."[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Expect an
invite aaany time now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And brace yourself.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a66591d3e3e341cd9ab50c6250e05e14" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]It's not just [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]—the Pikmin really seem
to have taken to you too.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a66591d3e3e341cd9ab50c6250e05e14" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]I guess I've gotten used to them at this
point,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but if I'm being honest...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]Rescue Pup
training suits me a whole lot better.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="eda87e0cf43d486cbd1bd9a4bbc71df0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]"[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]There's no better judge of character than
a dog.[System:Color name="Default"]"[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's the Shepherd family motto,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
passed down through the generations.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9258acf3fa0f48caa8a1627a225da246" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I promise that each and every one of the
skills you've had [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] learn will help you
out of a dire situation one day.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3d71b14dbd974765b4b883b52d371588" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]"[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]The best-laid plans often go awry.[System:Color name="Default"]"[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
As a captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's something I never
lose sight of.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3d71b14dbd974765b4b883b52d371588" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Once a captain has given a Rescue Officer
their mission,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's nothing to be done
but hope you'll see that officer again.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="00cb7f9e373d4fadaef52e949c61a1e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Listening to him talk,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you may not realize
it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s medical acumen is so good
even [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] acknowledges he's a genius.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7f21713c1a06437f816f0b9f71fd4643" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]About [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Try to have patience.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Remember—everyone needs to look like the
coolest person in the room now and then.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="343e1de737354246b92255ba72d202f4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s passion for research is admirable,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but when he leaves his equipment all over
the ship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's a real problem.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="343e1de737354246b92255ba72d202f4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]I keep telling him it's a danger for takeoff
and landing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He keeps telling me I should
bring his mother to clean up behind him!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9537804a078e4f80b7cfdd5f7740f4f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I've been around many an outstanding
Rescue Pup in my time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but Oatchi...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I feel
like there isn't anything he can't do.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="06429291b4ba48afb76f91452c1e05a8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Execute your missions with care and
precision.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's how you get your name
carved into Rescue Corps history!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="57886af2b0bc4773ad6a5ec50120f2d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is an excellent pilot,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and yet
even with him at the helm,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we crashed.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="57886af2b0bc4773ad6a5ec50120f2d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]The cause is still a mystery...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but I can't
help thinking something drew us here.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5548e34f73f24ceab6eaa4c82059a8b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is an extremely avid reader,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
his untiring spirit of academic curiosity
is something to be admired.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5548e34f73f24ceab6eaa4c82059a8b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]The problem is...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]he prefers paper books to
digital ones and has boxes upon boxes of
them shipped to us every week back at HQ.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="abdfcdee27444917a0ba9f9b1f760bda" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You can rest assured that during a rescue
mission,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] problems will arise that can't
be solved alone.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="abdfcdee27444917a0ba9f9b1f760bda" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]When that happens,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't hesitate to
turn to your fellow officers.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We're a
team here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Don't forget that.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="feedfa3ef71b44cfbf82685073439494" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]When this mission is over, take some time
off.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And take [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] along with you.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
He could use a bit of fun too.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="feedfa3ef71b44cfbf82685073439494" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]There's a big park near HQ.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a lovely
spot and has a nice dog run, to boot.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="863f0ea1ea984ee59940c93dae387ba7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is focused on concocting one
of his new medicines,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he forbids us from
entering the ship's lab.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="863f0ea1ea984ee59940c93dae387ba7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ObieFaceOnly"/]You wouldn't believe the sound of maniacal
laughter that comes out of there.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] We just
plug our ears and try to pay it no mind.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="fb5e47a68907487bbf03d246cd98f19b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]After talking with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]HOOO,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you
can't HELP but pick up the way he
speaks![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fb5e47a68907487bbf03d246cd98f19b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly2"/]Gah![etc:Wait frame="15"/] See what I mean?!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7c83ae1467cb4a0f8220b46a5ee08cb0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That wireless transceiver [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] uses...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
it's quite an antique.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was passed down
to him by his grandfather.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7c83ae1467cb4a0f8220b46a5ee08cb0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Needless to say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's very important to him.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Whenever it breaks,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he replaces the parts
himself and just keeps on using it.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3ea7f1714be94eeeafa652f94fd4b3b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is an ace of a ranger.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he
likes to conduct rescue operations on
his own...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3ea7f1714be94eeeafa652f94fd4b3b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]But if you hit an obstacle,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't hesitate
to call for help.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He'll support you
without fail.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9ba0f9df411b45ce8e527ff099a94a23" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I guess [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was part of some sort of
"dynamic duo" back home...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and that has
something to do with him becoming a pilot?
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e6a3d20116b54de4a30aa6b54e21f637" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I've been thinking...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]when this mission is
over, I should write a book about it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e6a3d20116b54de4a30aa6b54e21f637" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I've even decided on a title.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e6a3d20116b54de4a30aa6b54e21f637" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Rescue Pup Training: A Mission Like
No Other!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="769f5857962a41de8e42e8671034dfac" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]There's a limit to the amount of cargo a
spaceship can carry.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That means Rescue
Officers have to learn to travel light.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="769f5857962a41de8e42e8671034dfac" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]So imagine my surprise when [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] tried
to bring 27 shelves FULL of books.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] "Digital
books,"[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I told him.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "That's an order!"
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="52e23395f5164574a5e0c8f67b18e677" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s a superb pilot,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but when you look
at his resume...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he's done so much
you'd think he could be almost anything.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0d62eac4e83649e1897e79a55a42249b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I invited [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to dinner once as a reward
for all of his hard work.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d62eac4e83649e1897e79a55a42249b" Scale="1"/]He went bright red in the face,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then
fainted there on the spot.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It was the
strangest thing![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d62eac4e83649e1897e79a55a42249b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I think perhaps I'll try again after this
mission is over.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Surely he's feeling much
better by now.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_14:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="eed943d9f9df4da5b4ad2d101263e5c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Little known fact: [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] always wears a
lab coat under his space suit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "I am a
researcher first and foremost!" he says.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="eed943d9f9df4da5b4ad2d101263e5c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]For this mission,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] his mother gifted him 64
new lab coats.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You wouldn't believe how
much room they take up in the ship.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_15:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0ea0499828b8472c9083751e9f16aeb6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] may seem like he's irresponsible,
[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but when he sits down in the cockpit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he's
all focus.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0ea0499828b8472c9083751e9f16aeb6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Behind that boisterous personality of his,
[etc:Wait frame="8"/]he's a meticulous flying machine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] pulling
off maneuvers precise to a millisecond.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_16:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="66092e3e019647f993d5c522f7f0dae2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]You've made yourself into an indispensable
Rescue Officer,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] haven't you?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The work is
hard, but the rewards...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]they're BIG,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eh?
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_17:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="4350ce3f61b4434bba6fd196138c8126" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I hear that ever since [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was little,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
he's spent all of his free time tinkering
with machines.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4350ce3f61b4434bba6fd196138c8126" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]When he joined the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he was
already a highly skilled comms operator.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_18:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="48ea023d87de4996aa815643a9983576" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I consider myself real lucky to have
a scientific genius like [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] around.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
There's just...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]one problem.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="48ea023d87de4996aa815643a9983576" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]I have no idea what he's talking about
half the time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I find it best to just nod
approvingly.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Seems to make him feel good.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_19:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="62e0a2b637d44f55abaaeff45b4736b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]It's not just Oatchi—the Pikmin really seem
to have taken to you too.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="62e0a2b637d44f55abaaeff45b4736b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]I guess I've gotten used to them at this
point,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but if I'm being honest...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]Rescue Pup
training suits me a whole lot better.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_20:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5706cdf2329f4415b2e7fe10d10c2777" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]"[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]There's no better judge of character than
a dog.[System:Color name="Default"]"[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's the Shepherd family motto,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
passed down through the generations.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_21:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9a3e36129200472a860bee690172d231" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]"[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]The best-laid plans often go awry.[System:Color name="Default"]"[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
As a captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's something I never
lose sight of.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9a3e36129200472a860bee690172d231" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Once a captain has given a Rescue Officer
their mission,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's nothing to be done
but hope you'll see that officer again.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_22:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f9b800f376574c4a86f945dd6defae08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s passion for research is admirable,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but when he leaves his equipment all over
the ship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's a real problem.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f9b800f376574c4a86f945dd6defae08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]I keep telling him it's a danger for takeoff
and landing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He keeps telling me I should
bring his mother to clean up behind him!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="26d29afa7e7a4bcea850d95095720f77" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]The number one priority for a Rescue Pup
is saving lives.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Got it, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a95ff86341bf47fb81165a79ea5478ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's nothing I'd like to do more
than sit around giving you belly rubs.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But
we're on the job,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and belly rubs gotta wait.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c12ec5bc788c4c3eb1c57b6cd03e0cce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]That's the spirit![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Let's get started, then!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_Complete_0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="bed64856b0bd495b862a6443acfada8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]To be honest,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's nothing left for me
to teach you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But if you want to stay
sharp,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] you can always review your skills.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_SkillReward_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d343cf3599f34b2da0a527a5190d2899" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGlad"/]Great work, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've got just the
reward for you!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_SkillReward_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="bc9ae79ffdc14fb0b0c2eaa26ef6e8e2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGoodJob"/]You put everything you had into that
training![etc:Wait frame="8"/] What a good boy, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yes, you
are![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Now I have a special treat for you!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Continue_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="4d79f88a17c3400cb3ecbdeb3a6469d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]If there's anything you don't understand
or you want to know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just ask away!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Outro_A01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="42f404defa7d48b9aa3c45cf25db967c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Keep up the good work.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] And remember—
no slacking!
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Outro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d1693c92e8174133a88dd3fe0abe480a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Going forward,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] every time you complete
training,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you'll get a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Scrummy Bone[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Give it to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] as a reward for me.
SV001.SV001_Area500_Talk_Guide_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="fe9e9fbd90e34b68ae38e254a9c2aa2a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Rescue Pup training is a deep subject.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I wouldn't be surprised to find there are
skills that even I'm not aware of.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fe9e9fbd90e34b68ae38e254a9c2aa2a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]In fact,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is excellent at
handling pups too.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He might be able
to teach you a thing or two.
